nodes.bodyText: I don't think we should change the semantics of HoodieIOException. The idea is that an IOException is wrapped by hoodie to throw a HoodieIOException. This change gives the false impression by wrapping a generic exception.

@lw309637554 Can you check if the catch (Exception e) can be changed to catch (IOException io) ? If not that we are not just catching IOException but also other exceptions and then we should add appropriate multiple catch blocks and throw the correct exception.
